channel.title: Pop-up warning when you cross into wildy? PLZ HELP
channel.description: I don't know how to code a pop-up wildy warning for like when you cross a wilderness boundary that makes you stop and read it base is delta please help msn is elias46@gmail.com

item.title: Pop-up warning when you cross into wildy? PLZ HELP
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Add something like this:

public boolean wildpopup() { if ((absX >= %%%% && absX <= %%%% && absY >= %%%% && absY <= %%%%)) { setInterfaceWalkable(####); } }

Do the rest yourself.

Read full topic
